TermDesc: In Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst, when Resonance Skill Duet of Seraphic Plumes hits the target, if they are inflicted with Fusion Trail, remove the Fusion Trail stacks, and trigger the Fusion Burst on the target based on its max stack limit without removing its stacks. Each stack of Fusion Trail removed increases the DMG Multiplier of Fusion Burst on the main target by 10%.
